The two ways in which the Buddha spoke o: A safe place in a qualified sense - a mendicant who enters and remains in the first absorption
A safe place in a definitive sense - a mendicant who enters and remains in the cessation of perception and feeling, and has seen with wisdom, their defilements come to an end.
